doc:
Jorge Garcia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jorge_Garcia 0 Jorge Garcia (born April 28, 1973) is an American actor and comedian. He first came to public attention with his performance as Hector Lopez on the television show Becker, but is probably best known for his portrayal of Hugo "Hurley" Reyes in the television series Lost from 2004 to 2010. Garcia performs as a stand-up comedian. He starred in the FOX television series Alcatraz and played a minor character on ABC's Once Upon a Time. He stars as Jerry Ortega on Hawaii Five-0 and can be seen in the Netflix original movie Ridiculous 6. In 2010, Garcia appeared on the cover of the Weezer album Hurley in a close-up shot from a photo he took with Rivers Cuomo. Jorge_Garcia ( born April_28_,_1973 ) is an_American_actor_and_comedian . He first came to public_attention with his_performance as Hector_Lopez on the_television_show_Becker , but is_probably_best_known for his_portrayal of Hugo_"_Hurley_"_Reyes in the_television_series Lost from 2004 to 2010 . Garcia performs as a_stand-up_comedian . He starred in the_FOX_television_series_Alcatraz and played a_minor_character on ABC 's Once Upon a_Time . He stars as Jerry_Ortega on Hawaii_Five-0 and can_be_seen in the_Netflix_original_movie Ridiculous_6 . In 2010 , Garcia appeared on the_cover of the_Weezer_album_Hurley in a_close-up_shot from a_photo he took with Rivers_Cuomo .
